alert.note: Alert for Lapeer; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 11 at 2:52PM EDT until July 11 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Tuscola County in southeastern Michigan... Northwestern Lapeer County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 251 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Millington, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Mayville around 305 PM EDT. Clifford around 325 PM EDT. North Branch around 330 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include East Dayton, Silverwood and Fostoria. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
